dcterms:description: VirtualTB is a real-time simulation platform for recommendation, where the agent recommends items based on usersâ€™ dynamic interests. It uses a pre-trained generative adversarial imitation learning (GAIL) to generate different users who have both static interest and dynamic interest.
dcterms:title: VirtualTB

dcterms:description: RecSim is a configurable platform for authoring simulation environments that naturally supports sequential interaction with users in recommender systems. It contains different, simpler tasks but fewer users and items.
dcterms:title: RecSim

dcterms:creator: David Rohde

dcterms:description: RecoGym is a small Open AI gym-based platform designed for computational advertising, where users have no long-term goals. It uses click or not to represent the reward signal.
dcterms:title: RecoGym
